hero.title: The Future of Restaurant Management
hero.subtitle: A multi-tenant SaaS platform empowering restaurants with QR code ordering, real-time kitchen management, and comprehensive analytics.

features.title: Everything you need to run your restaurant
features.subtitle: From QR code ordering to kitchen management, Restorio provides a complete solution for modern restaurants.

cta.title: Ready to modernize your restaurant?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of restaurants already using Restorio to streamline their operations.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Empowering small restaurants with enterprise-grade tools.
mission.description: Restorio is an open-source restaurant management platform built to democratize access to powerful SaaS tools. We believe every restaurant, regardless of size, deserves modern technology to compete and thrive.

waiterless.title: Waiterless Ordering
waiterless.description: Enable customers to scan QR codes and place orders without waiter assistance.

multiLocation.title: Multi-location Support
multiLocation.description: Manage multiple restaurants under one tenant with location-specific settings.

secure.title: Secure & Scalable
secure.description: Built on modern infrastructure with JWT authentication and FastAPI backend.

costEfficient.title: Cost Efficient
costEfficient.description: Open source and self-hostable to minimize recurring costs for small businesses.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: This project is built as an academic engineer-degree project at NTNU. The codebase is open-source, and we encourage contributions from the community. By making restaurant technology accessible, we aim to support small businesses in their digital transformation.

problem.title: The Problem
problem.description: Traditional restaurant operations are labor-intensive and prone to inefficiencies. Small to medium-sized restaurants often lack the resources to adopt enterprise-level technology, leading to manual order-taking, kitchen miscommunication, and limited scalability. Existing SaaS solutions are expensive and not tailored for smaller establishments.

owners.title: Restaurant Owners
owners.description: Manage operations, view analytics, and configure menus across multiple locations.

staff.title: Staff & Kitchen
staff.description: Receive orders in real-time and manage kitchen workflows efficiently.

customers.title: End Customers
customers.description: Browse menus, place orders, and track order status without waiter interaction.

engineering.title: Engineering Focus
engineering.frontend: Modern React frontends with TypeScript, Vite, and Tailwind CSS.
engineering.backend: FastAPI (Python) with JWT authentication and PostgreSQL database.
engineering.realtime: WebSocket support for live order updates and kitchen displays.
engineering.deployment: Dockerized microservices ready for cloud deployment.
